name: spreadsheetAddRows
description: Adds multiple rows from a query to an Excel spreadsheet object.

examples.title: Tag Example
examples.code:
<!--- Using the datatype parameter ---> 
 <cfset val_arr = ["1.203E+4, 103E4, 11 Oct 1997, 17/08/2001, 07/20/1969, 15 Jan 1945, 23:59pm"]> 
 <cfset xlObj = spreadsheetNew("testsheet", true)> 
 <cfset spreadsheetAddRows(xlObj, val_arr, 1, 1, true, ["NUMERIC:1;STRING:2,3,4;DATE:"])> 
 <cfset spreadsheetwrite(xlObj, "#expandpath("./")#test_datatype.xlsx", "", true)>
